00009 #import "GHNSBundle+Utils.h"
00010 
00011 #import "NSString+SBJSON.h"
00012 
00013 @implementation NSBundle (GHUtils)
00014 
00015 - (NSData *)gh_loadDataFromResource:(NSString *)resource {
00016   NSParameterAssert(resource);
00017   NSString *resourcePath = [self pathForResource:[resource stringByDeletingPathExtension] ofType:[resource pathExtension]]; 
00018   if (!resourcePath) [NSException raise:NSInvalidArgumentException format:@"Resource not found: %@", resource]; 
00019   NSError *error = nil;
00020   NSData *data = [NSData dataWithContentsOfFile:resourcePath options:0 error:&error];
00021   if (error) [NSException raise:NSInvalidArgumentException format:@"Error loading resource at path (%@): %@", resourcePath, error];
00022   return data;
00023 }
00024 
00025 - (NSString *)gh_loadStringDataFromResource:(NSString *)resource {
00026   return [[[NSString alloc] initWithData:[self gh_loadDataFromResource:resource] encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding] autorelease];
00027 }
00028 
00029 - (id)gh_loadJSONFromResource:(NSString *)resource {
00030   return [[self gh_loadStringDataFromResource:resource] JSONValue];
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 @end
